Character_Title: Character title (you can find this in hoyowiki. If not found you can leave it empty)

Best_Artifacts_4x: best 4x Artifacts for this character if the character is being used as DPS
Best_Artifacts_2x: best 2x Artifacts for this character if the character is being used as DPS
Role_Build.Sub_Stats: You can find info about sub stats in keqing mains website. If you know the sub stats of artifacts you can put them here.

Team_Compositions: Team compositions if there are any
Character_Image_URL: This is the icon URL. leave empty or get the img url from the official site.
